definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[אַתָּ֫ה]], [[אָָתָּה]] (so regularly; but 26–7 t., with different disj. accents, [[אַָתָּה]]: v. Fr:MM 228; Sta:§ 178 a (rd. 8 for 18)

definitions.title: pron. 2 s.m.
definitions.body: thou (for anta, v. supr.; cf. [[נׇתַּתָּ]] for [[נׇתַנְתָּ]]) Ge 3:11, Ge 3:19 + oft. Written [[אַתָּ]] † 1Sa 24:19, Ps 6:4, Job 1:10, Ec 7:22, Ne 9:6. Appended to a vb. for emph., Ex 18:19, Ex 18:19, 1Sa 17:56 [[שְׁאַל אַתָּה]] inquire thou, 1Sa 20:8, 1Sa 22:18, Is 43:26 [[סַפֵּר אַתָּה]]. Added for the purpose of strengthening a gen. or accus. sf. 1Ki 21:19, Pr 22:19 (Ges:§ 135.2).
